name.baseName: North China (Gaomi) Wheat Production ; Agricultural Cultivation
华北(高密)小麦生产 ; 农业种植

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This study was conducted in Gaomi City, Shandong Province, which is located in Huang-Huai-hai Plain, the core area of winter wheat-summer maize rotation in China. The research was carried out in the form of a questionnaire survey, and a total of 56 farmers who operated wheat-maize rotation were interviewed. The contents of the questionnaire include input and output in the process of food production: (1) food output; (2) agricultural inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, fungicides and insecticides; (3) Energy consumption of agricultural machinery, including fuel consumption in the process of sowing, farming and grain transportation; (4) irrigation energy consumption, etc
本研究在山东省高密市进行，该地区位于我国 的冬小麦-夏玉米轮作核心区域——黄淮海平原。研 究以问卷调查的形式进行，共访问经营小麦-玉米轮 作的农户 56 户。问卷内容包括粮食生产过程中的投 入和产出情况：（1）粮食产量；（2）种子、肥料、除草剂、 杀菌剂和杀虫剂等农资投入；（3） 农业机械能耗情况， 包括播种、耕作和粮食运输等过程的油耗等；（4）灌溉 能耗等

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The study calculated the greenhouse gas emissions from the cradle to the door of the grain production process. The boundary of the accounting system includes: greenhouse gas emissions from agricultural inputs (such as seeds, agricultural medicines, fertilizers, etc.); Greenhouse gas emissions from the use of agricultural machinery (tillage, sowing, harvesting, food transportation, etc.); Field N2O emission caused by fertilizer application; Irrigation energy consumption, greenhouse gas emissions, etc. (Figure 1)
研究核算了粮食生产过程从摇篮到门口的温 室气体排放，核算系统边界包括：农资（例如种子、农 药、肥料等）投入的温室气体排放；农机使用过程（耕 作、播种、收获和粮食运输等）的温室气体排放；肥料 施用造成的田间 N2O 排放；灌溉能耗温室气体排放等 （图 1）
technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical application of this data set relates to the agricultural production of high density wheat in North China (Gaomi). The field of application mainly includes the analysis and improvement of environmental performance of wheat cultivation, through assessment of greenhouse gas emissions associated with different cultivation practices. This data can be used by researchers, environmental consultants, and agricultural professionals seeking to implement strategies for reducing the carbon footprint associated with grain production.
该数据集的技术应用涉及中国北部（高密）高密度小麦的农业生产。应用领域主要包括通过评估与不同耕作方式相关的温室气体排放，分析和改善小麦种植的环境绩效。研究人员、环境顾问和农业专业人员可以使用这些数据，寻求实施减少粮食生产相关碳足迹的策略。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The accounting system boundary includes: greenhouse gas emissions from agricultural input (such as seeds, pesticides, fertilizers, etc.); greenhouse gas emissions from the use of agricultural machinery during operations (tilling, sowing, harvesting, and grain transportation); greenhouse gas emissions from N2O during fertilizer application; greenhouse gas emissions from irrigation energy consumption, etc.
核算系统边界包括：农资（例如种子、农药、肥料等）投入的温室气体排放；农机使用过程（耕作、播种、收获和粮食运输等）的温室气体排放；肥料施用造成的田间N2O 排放；灌溉能耗温室气体排放等

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Because this study is based on survey data, it is impossible to obtain the baseline condition of soil carbon from the farmers. Due to different management methods of different farmers, the baseline condition of their soil carbon is different, so the change in soil carbon has not been accounted for. The functional unit chosen in this study is the carbon footprint per unit area and per unit yield.
由于本研究为调研数据，无法获得农户土壤碳的本底状况，且由于不同农户管理方式的不同，其土壤碳的本底状况不同，故没有在核算土壤碳的变化。本研究选取的功能单元为单位面积和单位产量的碳足迹
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Greenhouse gas emission accounting uses the methodology recommended in the '2006 IPCC National Greenhouse Gas Inventory Guidelines' and follows the international standard 'ISO/DIS 14067'.
温室气体排放核算采用《2006 IPCC 国家温室气体清单指南》推荐的方法学[20]，并依照国际标准《ISO/DIS 14067》进行

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 朱永昶,李玉娥,姜德锋等.基于生命周期评估的冬小麦-夏玉米种植系统碳足迹核算——以山东省高密地区为例[J].农业资源与环境学报,2017,34(05):473-482.
朱永昶,李玉娥,姜德锋等.基于生命周期评估的冬小麦-夏玉米种植系统碳足迹核算——以山东省高密地区为例[J].农业资源与环境学报,2017,34(05):473-482.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: The questionnaire includes inputs and outputs during the grain production process: (1) grain yield; (2) agricultural input such as seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, fungicides, and insecticides; (3) energy consumption of agricultural machinery, including fuel consumption for processes like sowing, ploughing, and grain transportation; (4) irrigation energy consumption.
问卷内容包括粮食生产过程中的投入和产出情况：（1）粮食产量；（2）种子、肥料、除草剂、杀菌剂和杀虫剂等农资入；（3） 农业机械能耗情况，包括播种、耕作和粮食运输等过程的油耗等；（4）灌溉能耗等。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data, it is critical to understand that the baseline condition of soil carbon has not been included due to the variability in management practices among different farmers and the lack of access to this information. Users should consider these limitations when interpreting the results or when comparing to systems where baseline soil carbon is accounted for. Methodological adherence to '2006 IPCC National Greenhouse Gas Inventory Guidelines' and 'ISO/DIS 14067' is advisable when considering the expansion or modification of the current data set, and while integrating this data into broader environmental management systems or LCA frameworks.
使用此数据时，至关重要的是要理解由于不同农户管理实践的多样性以及无法获得该信息，没有包含土壤碳的基线条件。用户在解释结果或与记账土壤碳的系统进行比较时，应考虑这些限制。建议在考虑扩展或修改当前数据集，以及将这些数据整合到更广泛的环境管理系统或生命周期评估框架时，遵循‘2006 IPCC 国家温室气体清单指南’和‘ISO/DIS 14067’的方法论。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
